name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, specializing in **Azure**, **Python**, and **MLOps**. Proficient in building and deploying microservices architecture and REST APIs, leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** practices to ensure reliable and scalable solutions. Expertise in implementing cloud-native applications and infrastructures on **Azure**, utilizing tools such as **Azure Functions**, **Azure ML**, **Cognitive Services**, and **Terraform** for effective deployment and orchestration.
Demonstrated ability to develop AI/ML-driven platforms that facilitate automated retraining and monitoring, implementing AI best practices using frameworks like **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **Flask**. Strong background in compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards. Committed to delivering high-performance applications across diverse sectors, with specific experience in healthcare and financial industries.
